title: 161. MrBeast Burgers Sells 1,000,000 Burgers in 2 Months Using Virtual Restaurants
description: On this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron explores the rise of YouTuber Jimmy Donaldson’s virtual restaurant concept, MrBeast Burger. The restaurant—which launched only two months ago—has already sold one million sandwiches.
itunes:author: Foodable Network
itunes:subtitle: On this episode of The Barron Report, host Paul Barron explores the rise of YouTuber Jimmy Donaldson’s virtual restaurant concept, MrBeast Burger. The restaurant—which launched only two months ago—has already sold one million sandwiches.
